infoText.part1: The export/import functionality allows you to save documents (system-generated or uploaded PDFs) and/or configurations made in the application to an external server (e.g., Nextcloud via WebDAV).
infoText.part2: This exported data can later be imported to restore your event configurations, templates, and settings.
